title: ripemdhash
author: ripemdhash
content: Hi I have found two public address , and they have output transactions.I know directly differents beetween them is less than 2**64I mean:address 1:S1*k1 - r1*x1 = z1address 2:S2*k2 - r2*x2 = z2x1-x2 = 374637563487658468475what can I do with this?
